mobs.long_desc: An iasgair is here, dangling a line into the water.
mobs.desc: A lean man with fiery red hair sits calmly in his small round boat. Several fishing lines dangle into the water and a stringer of fish hangs from his side.
A bird with feathers of the palest blue soars by on spread wings. Its head turns from side to side as it scans the kelp bed for entangled fish or snails. It must be some kind of gull.

mobs.long_desc: A large gray bird floats softly on the breeze overhead.
mobs.desc: Soft gray feathers tipped with blue form a striking pattern on this huge sea bird. You've never seen such a large bird! Its wings must span at least seven feet. It soars easily overhead, catching the breeze so skillfully that it seldom has to beat its mighty wings.

objects.ground: A long gray feather tipped with blue is floating here

extras.text: A wing feather from the rare gray liath, this quill is nearly a foot long. Prized by artisans and mages alike, it is in high demand as a scribing quill, especially for water-based spells as it comes from a seabird.  The feathers are also supposed to be lucky!

rooms.name: The Beginning of the Greengreen Sea
rooms.description: The waters below you are tinged with the deepest green.  It makes a sharp contrast to the blue seas you've walked before.  Below the surface, a tall kelp forest waves fronds slowly in the subtle action of the currents.  Here at the surface, the water is amazingly calm and glassy.  To the east, a great scattering of rocks lies waiting for you to scramble across their surfaces. Passage south and west seems doubtful as the great kelp forest breaches the surface in those directions.  North of you the calm, glassy pathway of water continues.

North.description: A haunting melody floats across the one clear, glassy path of green water like the lost sound of a lullaby.

East.description: A jumble of sharp rocks lies tumbled to your east.

South.description: Seaweed pokes its curious head above water to your south, blocking passage in that direction.

West.description: Nothing.

Up.description: The sky seems to have taken on a greenish hue. It doesn't look healthy.

Down.description: The tops of several strands of kelp wave at you from a few feet below the surface.

rooms.name: The Greengreen Sea
rooms.description: The waters below you are tinged with the deepest green.  Below the surface, a tall kelp forest waves fronds slowly in the subtle action of the currents. Here at the surface, the water is amazingly calm and glassy.  A tangled mat of kelp thrusts above the ocean to your north and to your east.  The narrow, clear lane of water continues to your south and to your west.

North.description: Flat fronds of seaweed form a thick, impassable mat on the surface.

East.description: Seaweed pokes its curious head above water, blocking passage in this direction.

South.description: The calm surface waters are clear of the entangling seaweed.

West.description: A haunting melody floats across the one clear, glassy path of green water like the lost sound of a lullaby.

Up.description: The sky seems to have taken on a greenish hue. It doesn't look healthy.

Down.description: Thick leaves of seaweed tangle and untangle in a slow dance just below the surface.

rooms.name: The Greengreen Sea
rooms.description: The waters below you are tinged with the deepest green.  Below the surface, a tall kelp forest waves fronds slowly in the subtle action of the currents. Here at the surface, the water is amazingly calm and glassy.  A tangled mat of kelp thrusts above the ocean to your north and to your south.  The narrow, clear lane of water continues to your east and to your west.

North.description: A narrow passage of open water runs between the tangles of kelp.

East.description: The calm surface waters are clear of the entangling seaweed.

South.description: Flat fronds of seaweed form a thick, impassable mat on the surface.

West.description: A haunting melody floats across the clear, glassy path of green water like the lost sound of a lullaby.

Up.description: The sky seems to have taken on a greenish hue. It doesn't look healthy.

Down.description: Thick leaves of seaweed tangle and untangle in a slow dance just below the surface.

rooms.name: An Entanglement in the Fronds
rooms.description: The dark green sea below you is preternaturally calm, but at least it's clear of seaweed.  You find this fact less reassuring than you did as you glance around and note how the kelp fronds have closed in all about you. There is no way out!  The menacing weeds even reach above you in a canopy, blocking all light from this tangle.

North.description: The tangling seaweed is impassable.

East.description: The tangling seaweed is impassable.

South.description: The tangling seaweed is impassable. The tangling seaweed seems impassable!

West.description: The tangling seaweed is impassable.

Up.description: The thick tangle above you blocks all view of the sky above.

Down.description: Dark green waters shine back at you, reflecting everything about you like the finest mirror, but giving no clue as to what's below.

North.description: Tall weeds wave in the wind. They block your view completely making you feel small and isolated in this unnatural forest on the open sea.

rooms.name: A Clearing upon the Greengreen Sea
rooms.description: The field of kelp has opened here into a small clearing.  Your way is open in every direction except south.  Clear pathways wind away from here in several directions.  One leads off immediately to your east.  Across the clearing, you can see two others: one leading west and the other south.

North.description: The open area extends ahead.

East.description: A narrow pathway, clear of the ever-present seaweed, leads off to the east.

South.description: Seaweed pokes its curious head above water, blocking passage in this direction.

West.description: The open area extends ahead.

Up.description: The sky seems to have taken on a greenish hue. It doesn't look healthy.

Down.description: Thick leaves of seaweed tangle and untangle in a slow dance just below the surface.

rooms.name: A Clearing upon the Greengreen Sea
rooms.description: The field of kelp has opened here into a small clearing.  Your way is open to the south and the west.  A little ways away, you can see clear pathways winding their way deeper into the kelp bed to the east, the south, and the west.  I wonder where they lead?

North.description: Flat fronds of seaweed form a thick, impassable mat on the surface.

East.description: Seaweed pokes its curious head above water, blocking passage in this direction.

South.description: The calm surface waters are clear of the entangling seaweed.

West.description: A haunting melody floats across the one clear, glassy path of green water like the lost sound of a lullaby.

Up.description: The sky seems to have taken on a greenish hue. It doesn't look healthy.

Down.description: Thick leaves of seaweed tangle and untangle in a slow dance just below the surface.

rooms.name: The Greengreen Sea
rooms.description: The green tinge is fading from the waters below you.  A more normal blue replaces it to the west.  Waves form beneath you and roll towards the rocks protecting a peninsula to your west.  The kelp holds sway to the north and the south.  The narrow, clear lane of water continues to your east.

North.description: Tall weeds wave in the wind. They block your view completely making you feel small and isolated in this unnatural forest on the open sea.

East.description: The calm surface waters are clear of the entangling seaweed. The passage disappears around a bend just ahead.

South.description: Tall weeds wave in the wind. They block your view completely making you feel small and isolated in this unnatural forest on the open sea.

West.description: A haunting melody floats across the clear, glassy path of green water like the lost sound of a lullaby.

Up.description: The green fades to blue above. A lone gull rides the currents far overhead.

Down.description: Thick leaves of seaweed tangle and untangle in a slow dance just below the surface.

rooms.name: The Beginning of the Greengreen Sea
rooms.description: The waters below you are faintly tinged with green.  A more normal blue replaces it to the west while the green deepens to your east.  Gentle waves roll beneath you toward the near shore area.  Tall kelp thrusts above the water to your north and south, blocking your passage.  A narrow, clear lane of water continues to your east.

North.description: Tall weeds wave in the wind. They block your view completely making you feel small and isolated in this unnatural forest on the open sea.

East.description: The narrow passage between the stands of kelp winds around a corner a short distance ahead. Who can tell where it leads?

South.description: Tall weeds wave in the wind. They block your view completely making you feel small and isolated in this unnatural forest on the open sea.

West.description: A sad melody fades away in the wind as you face a small area of shallow waters guarding the headland.

Up.description: The green fades to blue above. A lone gull rides the currents far overhead.

Down.description: Thick leaves of seaweed tangle and untangle in a slow dance just below the surface.

rooms.name: A T-Crossing on the Greengreen Sea
rooms.description: Tall fronds of kelp press in from nearby on all sides.  The press especially close to you from the west, but narrow passages of clear water wind a careful path between the strands to your north, south, and east.

North.description: A haunting melody floats across the clear, glassy path of green water like the lost sound of a lullaby.

East.description: The calm surface waters are clear of the entangling seaweed.

South.description: The calm surface waters are clear of the entangling seaweed.

West.description: Flat fronds of seaweed form a thick, impassable mat on the surface. Nothing is visible between the weave.

Up.description: The sky seems to have taken on a greenish hue. It doesn't look healthy.

Down.description: Thick leaves of seaweed tangle and untangle in a slow dance just below the surface.

Gentle waves roll beneath you toward the near shore area.  Tall kelp thrusts above the water to your north and south, blocking your passage.  A narrow, clear lane of water continues to your east.

North.description: Tall weeds wave in the wind. They block your view completely making you feel small and isolated in this unnatural forest on the open sea.

East.description: The narrow passage between the stands of kelp winds around a corner a short distance ahead. Who can tell where it leads?

South.description: Tall weeds wave in the wind. They block your view completely making you feel small and isolated in this unnatural forest on the open sea.

West.description: The sounds of bells and laughter carry across the water from the woods on the island.

Up.description: The green fades to blue above. A lone gull rides the currents far overhead.

Down.description: Thick leaves of seaweed tangle and untangle in a slow dance just below the surface.
